xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} #foreach($item in $xwiki.searchDocuments(",BaseObject as obj where doc.fullName=obj.name and obj.className='FileManager.XamboxDocumentClass'")) * $item #if($request.confirm) $xwiki.getDocument($item).delete() #end #end
[[Confirm delete>>||queryString="confirm=1"]] {{/velocity}}
